column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had a blast tonight! Our good friend visiting from Japan
column2: Â wanted to try something new and we decided to take her to one of our favorite restaurants
column3: Cafe baba reeba! And she really enjoyed it! Moreover
column4: there was no waiting this time for our seats and the service was excellent as always. This place is still one of my favorite places to have tapas. I definitely would eat here again and I definitely would recommend them to my friends and family.
